page.syntax: File_List as C = files_in_table(C tablename [,C options ])

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of a table. The file extension ".dbf" is assumed.

page.description: Returns a crlf delimited string of files in a table. Options "d" - include Dictionary, "x" - include Indexes
page.discussion: FILES_IN_TABLE() returns a CR-LF delimited character string list containing the fully qualified names of the components of the table.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = files_in_table("customer") cs -> c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.fpt
